title: Rudhra Garuda Purana
overview: Manu, a minister`s son, disappears after college, and Officer Rudra is assigned to investigate. Rudra learns that Manu and his girlfriend, Katyayani, had been secretly traveling on a BMTC bus. The mystery deepens when Rudra discovers that the bus route was discontinued 25 years ago after a tragic accident. Now, the question looms: how did the bus reappear, and where is Manu?
